summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Submissions page functionality. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend UI/UX testing mostly successful with minor session management issues.

integration_issues.issue: JWT tokens appear to have short expiration causing session timeouts during extended testing

passed_tests: Combined status and content_type filtering works
Page displays correct title 'Submissions' and subtitle
All 10 required form fields present with data-testid attributes
Submit form card and submissions list card present
Submissions list displays 11 entries (seeded + API created)
